description: Used by activity workers, Task states using the callback pattern, and optionally Task states using the job run pattern to report that the task identified by the taskToken completed successfully.

parameters.name: taskToken
parameters.description: The token that represents this task. Task tokens are generated by Step Functions when tasks are assigned to a worker, or in the context object when a workflow enters a task state. See  GetActivityTaskOutput$taskToken.

parameters.name: output
parameters.description: The JSON output of the task. Length constraints apply to the payload size, and are expressed as bytes in UTF-8 encoding.
